function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Population reflux in labour intensive cities leading to future outbreaks","Impact":"Potential large-scale outbreak of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement strong measures to prevent population reflux and strengthen public health security in critical urban infrastructures","Technologies":"Bio resilient transport infrastructure, bioaerosol samplers, public health security measures","People":"Residents of labour intensive cities, densely populated areas","Owner":"City government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Use of bioaerosol samplers in crowded public spaces to monitor respiratory viruses","Impact":"Potential spread of respiratory viruses in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Noninvasive monitoring of respiratory viruses using bioaerosol samplers to identify and prevent outbreaks","Technologies":"Bioaerosol samplers, noninvasive monitoring technology","People":"Residents of densely populated areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, city government"},{"Description":"Lack of infrastructure preparedness for respiratory pandemics","Impact":"Vulnerability to large-scale outbreaks and unpreparedness for pandemic response","Mitigation":"Incorporate public health security across the life cycle phases of critical urban infrastructures, including transport, and implement sustainable urban planning for cities","Technologies":"Bio resilient transport infrastructure, sustainable urban planning","People":"Residents of urban areas","Owner":"City planners, urban developers"}]}
